      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Dataset copied from the cd obtained from Washington, DC 2005

The school boundaries were heads-up digitized from paper maps supplied by the D.C. public schools and the 1995 orthos.  They do not include private or charter schools.  Maps were created in the fall of 2000 and reviewed by D.C. Public Schools.

Although these boundaries follow existing snapbase features, the digitized boundaries are not identical to those base features.  Differences are not significant at scales fitting a letter-sized page, but differences may become apparent when zoomed in further.  Given this, these boundaries are not coincident with geography from other DC GIS datasets.

All DC GIS data is stored and exported in Maryland State Plane coordinates NAD 83 meters.</procdesc>
        <procdate>2003</procdate>
        <proccont>
          <cntinfo>
            <cntorgp>
              <cntorg>D.C. Office of the Chief Technology Officer</cntorg>
              <cntper>GIS Data Coordinator</cntper>
            </cntorgp>

              <address>441 4th St NW, Suite 930 South</address>
              <city>Washington</city>
              <state>DC</state>
              <postal>20001</postal>
              <country>USA</country>
            </cntaddr>
            <cntvoice/>
            <cntfax>(202) 727-5660</cntfax>
            <cntemail>dcgis@dc.gov</cntemail>
          </cntinfo>
        </proccont>
      </procstep>
